mapper.select: SELECT fa.*, fp.process_name, au.username as apply_user_name, cu.username as current_approver_name FROM flow_approval fa LEFT JOIN flow_process fp ON fa.process_id = fp.id LEFT JOIN sys_user au ON fa.apply_user_id = au.id LEFT JOIN sys_user cu ON fa.current_approver_id = cu.id WHERE fa.id = #{id} AND fa.is_deleted = 0

SELECT fa.*, fp.process_name, au.username as apply_user_name FROM flow_approval fa LEFT JOIN flow_process fp ON fa.process_id = fp.id LEFT JOIN sys_user au ON fa.apply_user_id = au.id WHERE fa.current_approver_id = #{approverId} AND fa.approval_status = 1 AND fa.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY fa.apply_time DESC

SELECT fa.*, fp.process_name, au.username as apply_user_name FROM flow_approval fa LEFT JOIN flow_process fp ON fa.process_id = fp.id LEFT JOIN sys_user au ON fa.apply_user_id = au.id WHERE fa.apply_user_id = #{applyUserId} AND fa.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY fa.apply_time DESC
